title: Your Risk Scores Are Lying: Adversarial Exposure Validation Exposes Real Threats
description: In cybersecurity, confidence is a double-edged sword. Organizations often operate under a false sense of security, believing that patched vulnerabilities, up-to-date tools, polished dashboards, and glowing risk scores guarantee safety.
